Travis Hoium ( TMFFlushDraw ) Dec 27, 2014 at 4:00PM This has been a wild year for those following the stock market. We've seen new record highs, oil crumble in a matter of months, and the U.S. economy power along, driven by new innovations that seemed impossible just a few years ago (think electric vehicles, solar energy, and Uber).
